statements: SELECT concert_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM ConcertData;
SELECT * FROM ConcertData WHERE total_tickets_sold > 1000;
SELECT venue_name, total_tickets_sold FROM ConcertData ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConcertData WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT concert_id, concert_name, venue_name FROM ConcertData WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConcertData WHERE concert_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, total_tickets_sold FROM ConcertData WHERE total_tickets_sold > 500 ORDER BY total_tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM ConcertData WHERE venue_name = 'Madison Square Garden' AND concert_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT concert_id, concert_name, venue_name FROM ConcertData WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Arena%' AND total_tickets_sold BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT concert_name, total_tickets_sold, ticket_price FROM ConcertData WHERE concert_id = '3e34b52f-18b6-4e2f-8188-78d40a7f78b0' OR concert_id = 'bf4e80b2-54c3-4288-9008-8a948b266af5';
SELECT * FROM ConcertAttendance;
SELECT concert_id, venue, attendance_count FROM ConcertAttendance ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT concert_id, venue, attendance_count FROM ConcertAttendance WHERE attendance_count > 100;
SELECT ticket_id, concert_id, ticket_type, price FROM TicketSales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT venue, COUNT(*) AS total_concerts FROM ConcertAttendance GROUP BY venue HAVING total_concerts > 3;
SELECT * FROM ConcertAttendance WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY concert_date DESC
SELECT venue, COUNT(*) FROM ConcertAttendance GROUP BY venue HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TicketSales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT concert_date, venue, price FROM ConcertAttendance INNER JOIN TicketSales ON ConcertAttendance.concert_id = TicketSales.concert_id ORDER BY concert_date ASC, price DESC
SELECT MAX(attendance_count) AS max_attendance, MIN(attendance_count) AS min_attendance FROM ConcertAttendance
SELECT concert_id, date, location, attendance_count FROM concert_attendance;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT concert_id, SUM(attendance_count) AS total_attendance FROM concert_attendance GROUP BY concert_id;
SELECT audience_id, age, gender, income_range FROM audience_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY concert_id;
SELECT * FROM concert_attendance ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(concert_id) AS num_concerts FROM concert_attendance GROUP BY location;
SELECT audience_id, age, gender FROM audience_demographics WHERE income_range = 'High';
SELECT concert_id, date, location, attendance_count FROM concert_attendance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.ticket_id, t.ticket_type, t.price, s.sale_date FROM ticket_sales t JOIN concert_attendance c ON t.concert_id = c.concert_id JOIN audience_demographics a ON t.concert_id = a.concert_id WHERE c.location = 'New York' ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, venue, concert_date FROM Concerts;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM Tickets;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM Concerts WHERE attendance > 100 ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT concert_name, venue, attendance FROM Concerts WHERE venue = 'Madison Square Garden';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Sales WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card');
SELECT concert_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM Concerts JOIN Tickets ON Concerts.concert_id = Tickets.concert_id WHERE ticket_price < 50 ORDER BY concert_date;
SELECT COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales, SUM(ticket_price) AS total_revenue FROM Sales JOIN Tickets ON Sales.ticket_id = Tickets.ticket_id WHERE payment_method = 'Cash';
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, attendance_count FROM Concerts WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(ticket_sales) AS max_ticket_sales FROM Concerts;
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM Venues ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, attendance_count FROM Concerts;
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity, location FROM Venues ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT ct.concert_name, t.ticket_number, t.price FROM Concerts ct INNER JOIN Tickets t ON ct.id = t.concert_id;
